title: Watch Face PIXXWATCH

description: Digital watch face for Android WearYou can create your personal watch face for your wearable.Select your favorite picture and make it easily appear as your watchfaces background.Either select an existing photo from your smartphones gallery or instantly create one with your smartphones camera.As a special bonus, PIXXWATCH comes with some exclusiv background photos from pixxpower.chin the built-in watchface gallery.You can customize your watchface: Select from different fonts and colours and choose the size and position of the digital clock.Compatible with:★LG G Watch★LG G Watch R★LG Watch Urbane★Moto 360★Huawai★Sony Smartwatch 3.... and other Android smart watches.
descriptionHTML:
Digital watch face for Android Wear

You can create your personal watch face for your wearable.

Select your favorite picture and make it easily appear as your watchfaces background.
Either select an existing photo from your smartphones gallery or instantly create one with your smartphones camera.

As a special bonus, PIXXWATCH comes with some exclusiv background photos from pixxpower.ch
in the built-in watchface gallery.

You can customize your watchface: Select from different fonts and colours and choose the size and position of the digital clock.

Compatible with:
★LG G Watch
★LG G Watch R
★LG Watch Urbane
★Moto 360
★Huawai
★Sony Smartwatch 3
.... and other Android smart watches.
recentChanges: - Support Cloud storage for gallery images
